item.title: Lessons From Strangers
item.description:
Description

Presented by: Rachel Sanders

Why are some workplaces vibrant and innovative, and others fetid pits of despair? Why are some products loved and others DOA? I dove into the strange world of business and psychology and emerged a better engineer.
item.dc:creator: Rachel Sanders

item.title: Developing Flask Extensions
item.description:
Summary

You can create a web application with Flask in seven lines of code, and you can grow that app to thousands. How do you create reusable, shareable libraries? We'll use a simple but real extension I created (Flask-FeatureFlags) to look at the different ways you can make Flask awesome.
item.dc:creator: Rachel Sanders
